net.shadowfacts.mirror.stream

Class ClassStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shadowfacts.mirror.stream.ClassStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.stream.BaseStream<MirrorClass<?>,java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorClass<?>>>, java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorClass<?>>

    public class ClassStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.stream.Stream<MirrorClass<?>>
    A wrapper for a stream of MirrorClasses that provides helper operations
    See Also:
    Mirror.ofAllUnwrapped(Stream), Mirror.ofAllUnwrapped(Class[]), Mirror.ofAllUnwrapped(Collection), Mirror.ofAllUnwrapped(net.shadowfacts.mirror.scanner.Scanner, Object)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.stream.Stream

        java.util.stream.Stream.Builder<T>
